de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.database

Class DatabaseRequests

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.database.DatabaseRequests

  • public class DatabaseRequests
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some Database utils. There is no Javadoc, because the functions just forwards to functions in the according *Management (e.g UserManagement) class.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke
